name: Plum
role: Suga Overlord & Head and Graphics Mods
blurb: hi i'm plum and i love sugawara!! ((labored breathing)) i'm so excited to host this project and work together to show our appreciation for suga!
thought: there is a lot of beauty in an 'average' character who is able to break through those insecurities to become the best person they can be despite it all! he shows me the healthiest self i can be :') also he is insane

name: Mimi
blurb: hi, i’m mimi and i love suga a completely normal amount, absolutely no craziness in my mind ((kicks fallen item back into closet full of shrimp, bunny, and watermelon themed things))
thought: who wouldn’t love suga? at first he seems sweet and friendly (which he is), then he shows his true nature to be a total gremlin. that just resonates in my a lot, and i just think he should be celebrated the way he celebrates his teammates

name: Kay
blurb: hi i'm kay and i’ll let you in on a secret… i also love sugawara! suga has always been one of my favorite characters and i’m so excited to work on this zine for him (and make him and matsukawa kiss)
thought: despite what others may think, suga is such an important influence to every player on karasuno. he’s a strong figure and always tries to be the best version of himself. plus, his sock collection is A+ and i need to know where he buys them

name: Ika
blurb: hi i'm ika! love for suga can be expressed in so many ways. in my case, i shower him with love through oikawa (and iwa… and daichi… and kageyama… and matsukawa… and kenma………..) he’s always so fun to write and draw and i just love him and all his layers!!!
thought: suga is such a pivotal character in the series. though often sidelined, he always makes everything count. he does his best by being the best support, showing me that you don’t need to be a genius to be able to make a mark. all you have to be is sincere and kind and passionate about what you do, and you will be happy!!
